japan.name: Nigiri Sushi
japan.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with fresh fish, a cornerstone of Japanese cuisine.
instructions: Rinse sushi rice until water runs clear, then cook according to package instructions
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl until dissolved
Transfer cooked rice to a wooden bowl and gently fold in the vinegar mixture
Let rice cool to room temperature while preparing fish
Slice salmon into thin strips about 2 inches long
Wet hands with water and form small rice balls (about 1 tbsp each)
Place a small amount of wasabi on rice and top with salmon slice
Gently press to shape and serve immediately
japan.tips: Keep your hands wet while forming rice balls to prevent sticking. Use the freshest fish possible for the best flavor.

japan.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
japan.description: Rich pork bone broth ramen with tender chashu pork and perfectly cooked noodles.
instructions: Place pork bones in a large pot and cover with cold water
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 8 hours, adding water as needed
Meanwhile, prepare chashu pork by rolling and tying pork belly
Mix soy sauce, mirin, and water in a pot and simmer chashu for 2 hours
Strain the broth and season with salt to taste
Cook noodles according to package instructions
Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, sliced chashu, and toppings
japan.tips: The key to good tonkotsu broth is long, slow cooking to extract maximum flavor from the bones.

japan.name: Tempura
japan.description: Light and crispy battered vegetables and seafood, a perfect example of Japanese frying technique.
instructions: Mix flour and cornstarch in a bowl
Whisk egg yolk with ice water in a separate bowl
Gently fold wet ingredients into dry ingredients (lumps are okay)
Heat oil to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C)
Dip vegetables and shrimp in batter and fry until golden
Drain on paper towels and serve immediately with tempura sauce
japan.tips: Keep the batter cold and don't overmix - lumps create the characteristic tempura texture.

italy.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
italy.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper - simple yet sublime.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water
Meanwhile, cook diced pancetta in a large pan until crispy
Whisk eggs, grated cheese, and pepper in a bowl
Drain pasta and add to pancetta pan with some pasta water
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Add more pasta water if needed for creamy consistency
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper
italy.tips: The key is to work quickly and not let the eggs scramble. Remove from heat before adding eggs.

italy.name: Margherita Pizza
italy.description: The iconic Neapolitan pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil - simplicity at its finest.
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, water, and salt to form a dough
Knead for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic
Let dough rise for 2-3 hours in a warm place
Preheat oven to maximum temperature with pizza stone
Stretch dough by hand and add toppings
Bake for 10-15 minutes until crust is charred and cheese melted
Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil
italy.tips: Use a pizza stone and preheat your oven to maximum temperature for authentic Neapolitan results.

italy.name: Risotto ai Funghi
italy.description: Creamy mushroom risotto with Arborio rice, a northern Italian specialty.
instructions: Saut√© mushrooms in butter until golden, then set aside
Toast rice in remaining butter until translucent
Add wine and stir until absorbed
Add hot stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue adding stock until rice is al dente (about 20 minutes)
Stir in mushrooms, cheese, and parsley
Let rest for 2 minutes before serving
italy.tips: Keep your stock hot and add it gradually while constantly stirring for the creamiest texture.

mexico.name: Tacos al Pastor
mexico.description: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, inspired by Lebanese shawarma and served on corn tortillas.
instructions: Mix achiote paste, pineapple juice, vinegar, and spices
Marinate pork in mixture for 4 hours or overnight
Grill or roast pork until cooked through and slightly charred
Slice pork thinly against the grain
Warm tortillas on a griddle
Fill with pork, grilled pineapple, cilantro, and lime
Serve with salsa and additional lime wedges
mexico.tips: The key is the achiote marinade and the contrast between savory pork and sweet pineapple.

mexico.name: Mole Poblano
mexico.description: Complex sauce with chocolate, chilies, and spices, served over turkey or chicken.
instructions: Toast chilies, seeds, and spices until fragrant
Grind toasted ingredients to a fine powder
Blend with chocolate and stock to form a paste
Simmer sauce for 1-2 hours until thickened
Cook turkey in the mole sauce until tender
Serve over rice with warm tortillas
Garnish with sesame seeds and fresh herbs
mexico.tips: Mole is all about balance - the chocolate should enhance, not dominate, the complex spice profile.

mexico.name: Guacamole
mexico.description: Fresh avocado dip with lime, cilantro, and jalape√±o - the perfect accompaniment to Mexican dishes.
instructions: Halve and pit avocados, scoop flesh into a bowl
Mash avocados with a fork to desired consistency
Finely dice onion and jalape√±o
Mix all ingredients gently to combine
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed
Serve immediately to prevent browning
mexico.tips: Use perfectly ripe avocados and add lime juice immediately to prevent oxidation.

india.name: Butter Chicken
india.description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce - a beloved Indian classic.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Grill or bake chicken until charred and cooked through
Saut√© onions, ginger, and garlic until golden
Add tomato puree and simmer for 15 minutes
Blend sauce until smooth
Add cream, butter, and chicken
Simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens
Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan
india.tips: The key is the yogurt marinade and the balance of spices. Don't skip the cream and butter for authentic richness.

india.name: Chicken Biryani
india.description: Layered rice dish with spiced chicken, aromatic basmati rice, and caramelized onions.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Soak saffron in warm milk for 30 minutes
Par-cook rice until 70% done
Layer half the rice, then chicken, then remaining rice
Sprinkle saffron milk, fried onions, and herbs
Seal pot with foil and cook on low heat for 45 minutes
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving
Garnish with fried onions and serve with raita
india.tips: The key is the layering technique and the 'dum' cooking method - slow cooking in a sealed pot.

india.name: Garlic Naan
india.description: Soft, fluffy flatbread brushed with garlic butter - the perfect accompaniment to Indian curries.
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, water, yogurt, and oil to form a dough
Knead for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic
Let dough rise for 2-3 hours in a warm place
Divide into 8 pieces and roll into ovals
Heat a griddle or cast iron pan
Cook naan until bubbles form and bottom is golden
Brush with garlic butter and garnish with cilantro
Serve hot with curry dishes
india.tips: The yogurt in the dough creates the characteristic soft texture. Cook on high heat for the best results.

france.name: Coq au Vin
france.description: Classic French braised chicken in red wine with mushrooms, pearl onions, and bacon.
instructions: Marinate chicken in wine with vegetables for 4 hours
Cook bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside
Brown chicken pieces in bacon fat
Add wine marinade and bring to a simmer
Add vegetables and herbs, cover and simmer for 1 hour
Add mushrooms and pearl onions, cook for 15 minutes
Return bacon to pot and simmer until sauce thickens
Serve with crusty bread or mashed potatoes
france.tips: Use a good quality red wine for the marinade - it makes all the difference in the final flavor.

france.name: Ratatouille
france.description: Proven√ßal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, and herbs - a celebration of summer vegetables.
instructions: Slice all vegetables into uniform rounds
Salt eggplant and let drain for 30 minutes
Saut√© onions and garlic until soft
Layer vegetables in a casserole dish
Sprinkle with herbs and drizzle with olive oil
Cover and bake at 350¬∞F for 45 minutes
Uncover and bake for 15 minutes until vegetables are tender
Serve warm or at room temperature
france.tips: The key is uniform slicing and layering. Let it rest before serving to allow flavors to meld.

france.name: Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e
france.description: Classic French custard with a caramelized sugar crust - elegant and indulgent.
instructions: Heat cream with vanilla bean until just simmering
Whisk egg yolks with sugar until pale and thick
Slowly pour hot cream into egg mixture, whisking constantly
Strain custard and pour into ramekins
Bake in a water bath at 325¬∞F for 45 minutes
Chill for at least 4 hours or overnight
Sprinkle with turbinado sugar and caramelize with a torch
Serve immediately while sugar is still crisp
france.tips: The water bath ensures even cooking and prevents the custard from curdling. Don't skip the straining step.
